title: Gorgeous 1911 t3 harry niles boston and cleveland SOLD
author: Republicaninmass

posts.post_title: Gorgeous 1911 t3 harry niles boston and cleveland SOLD
posts.post_content:
Not one of the easier guys to find, no creases just stunning color with nice ad back.  Raymond f Miner has written his name lightly on the lightly soiled back.  This looks to be solid vg or vg-ex very tough to find in decent shape with the name on back making this one affordable

looking for $175 Best offer


[IMG]http://i77.photobucket.com/albums/j46/teddytouch7239/For%20Sale%20or%20Trade/acards517_zps1a3db07d.jpg[/IMG]

Love the image and strong red present in the pic.  Best of luck with the sale!
